body.p:
Lebanon October 17/1865
To his Excellency Thomas E. Bramlette
Hillery Rhodes

your petitioner Hillery Rhodes stats that ^at^ the term 1864 of the Marion Circuit court he was indicted by the Grand jury of said county and charged with the offence of assault and Battery upon James Craig. And he further states that at the August term 1865 of the Marion Circuit Court he was fined the sum of twenty dollars ($2000) your petitioner states that he is in very indigent circumstances and has a large family dependent upon hom for support he has no way of supporting his famiy Except to work by the day. and small as this sum is it will be a severe hardship for him to be compeled to pay it your petitioner humbly requests and prays your Excellency to remit the said fine --
The undersigned loyal citizens of Marion county believing the above case to be one Eminently deserving the interposition of Executive clemency join in the foregoing petition
